title: Iranian Embassy In Syria's Damascus 'Attacked': Report
content: Iranian newspaper Tehran Times reported online that Iranian diplomats had left the embassy before it was attacked, citing foreign ministry spokesman Esmaeil Baqaei.
summary: Iranian newspaper Tehran Times reported online that Iranian diplomats had left the embassy before it was attacked, citing foreign ministry spokesman Esmaeil Baqaei.

title: Syrian Opposition Leader Calls For 18 Month Transition Period Before Polls
content: Syria should have an 18 month transition period to establish "a safe, neutral, and quiet environment" for free elections, Hadi Al-Bahra, the head of Syria's main opposition abroad, said to Reuters on the sidelines of the Doha Forum on Sunday.
summary: Syria should have an 18 month transition period to establish "a safe, neutral, and quiet environment" for free elections, Hadi Al-Bahra, the head of Syria's main opposition abroad, said to Reuters on the sidelines of the Doha Forum on Sunday.

title: 43,000 Ukrainian Troops Killed, Kyiv Wants 'Enduring' Peace: Zelensky
content: "Ukrainians want peace more than anyone else. Russia brought war to our land, and it is Russia that most seeks to disrupt the possibility of peace," Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelensky said.
summary: "Ukrainians want peace more than anyone else. Russia brought war to our land, and it is Russia that most seeks to disrupt the possibility of peace," Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelensky said.

title: Syrians Take Over Assad's Palaces, Click Pictures, Loot Furniture
content: Groups of Syrians strolled through the palaces of President Bashar al-Assad on Sunday following his ouster, wandering from room to room, posing for photographs, and with some taking items of furniture or ornaments.
summary: Groups of Syrians strolled through the palaces of President Bashar al-Assad on Sunday following his ouster, wandering from room to room, posing for photographs, and with some taking items of furniture or ornaments.

title: From UK To China, Nations Urge "Stability" After Syria's Assad Ousted
content: Islamist-led rebels toppled Syria's longtime ruler Bashar al-Assad in a lightning offensive that a UN envoy called "a watershed moment" for the nation marred by civil war.
summary: Islamist-led rebels toppled Syria's longtime ruler Bashar al-Assad in a lightning offensive that a UN envoy called "a watershed moment" for the nation marred by civil war.

title: "He Will End Up In Hell": Syrians In Turkey Rejoice Over Assad's Fall
content: Hundreds of Syrians celebrated the fall of long-time ruler Bashar al-Assad in joyous scenes on Sunday outside the Fatih Mosque in central Istanbul, one of the focal points for their 500,000-strong Syrian community in the Turkish city.
summary: Hundreds of Syrians celebrated the fall of long-time ruler Bashar al-Assad in joyous scenes on Sunday outside the Fatih Mosque in central Istanbul, one of the focal points for their 500,000-strong Syrian community in the Turkish city.

title: Indians Facing Mass Dubai Visa Rejection After New Application Rules: Report
content: After the United Arab Emirates (UAE) mandated stricter requirements for tourist visa applications for Dubai, Indians looking to visit the Gulf city are reportedly witnessing an unprecedented rise in visa rejections.
summary: After the United Arab Emirates (UAE) mandated stricter requirements for tourist visa applications for Dubai, Indians looking to visit the Gulf city are reportedly witnessing an unprecedented rise in visa rejections.

title: "Watershed Moment In Syria's History": UN Special Envoy On Assad's Fall
content: The UN envoy for Syria said the country was at "a watershed moment" on Sunday after rebels declared they had taken the capital, Damascus.
summary: The UN envoy for Syria said the country was at "a watershed moment" on Sunday after rebels declared they had taken the capital, Damascus.

title: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad Has Left The Country: Russia
content: The Russian Foreign Ministry said on Sunday that Syrian President Bashar al-Assad had left office and departed the country after giving orders there be a peaceful handover of power.
summary: The Russian Foreign Ministry said on Sunday that Syrian President Bashar al-Assad had left office and departed the country after giving orders there be a peaceful handover of power.

title: New Syrian Administration Must Be Inclusive: Turkish Foreign Minister
content: Turkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan called to "unite and reconstruct" Syria in an orderly manner, without compromising on inclusiveness.
summary: Turkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan called to "unite and reconstruct" Syria in an orderly manner, without compromising on inclusiveness.

title: Syrian Rebels Enter Northern City Of Manbij: Report
content: Turkey-backed Syrian forces entered the northern Syrian city of Manbij after taking control of most of the surrounding area from US-allied Kurdish forces there, a Turkish security source said on Sunday.
summary: Turkey-backed Syrian forces entered the northern Syrian city of Manbij after taking control of most of the surrounding area from US-allied Kurdish forces there, a Turkish security source said on Sunday.

title: Video: Syria Rebels Inside Presidential Palace, Tear Assad Family Portraits
content: Islamist-led rebels declared they had taken Damascus in a lightning offensive on Sunday, sending President Bashar al-Assad fleeing and ending five decades of Baath rule in Syria.
summary: Islamist-led rebels declared they had taken Damascus in a lightning offensive on Sunday, sending President Bashar al-Assad fleeing and ending five decades of Baath rule in Syria.

title: Storm Darragh: 2 Dead As Heavy Rain, Winds Wrecks Havoc In UK
content: Tens of thousands of homes across the UK were left without power on Saturday and two people were killed after Storm Darragh hit the country with strong winds and caused pre-Christmas travel disruption.
summary: Tens of thousands of homes across the UK were left without power on Saturday and two people were killed after Storm Darragh hit the country with strong winds and caused pre-Christmas travel disruption.

title: After Assad's Fall, Syrian Opposition Flag Unfurled At Athens Embassy
content: The Syrian opposition flag was unfurled at the Syrian embassy in Athens on Sunday, hours after Islamist-led rebels declared they had taken Damascus, ending the rule of President Bashar al-Assad.
summary: The Syrian opposition flag was unfurled at the Syrian embassy in Athens on Sunday, hours after Islamist-led rebels declared they had taken Damascus, ending the rule of President Bashar al-Assad.

title: Russia Was Not Interested In Protecting Syria's Assad: Donald Trump
content: US President-elect Donald Trump said on Sunday that Russia's abandonment of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad led to his downfall.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump said on Sunday that Russia's abandonment of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad led to his downfall.

title: Indian-Origin Man, 20, Shot Dead In Canada, 2nd Death Within A Week
content: Harshandeep Singh, a 20-year-old Indian-origin man, working as a security guard in Canada, was shot dead on Friday, the Police said.
summary: Harshandeep Singh, a 20-year-old Indian-origin man, working as a security guard in Canada, was shot dead on Friday, the Police said.

title: South Korean Oppn Plans New Impeachment Push To Oust President: Top Points
content: South Korea's leadership crisis deepened on Sunday as the country's main opposition party said that it would try again to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol after his short-lived attempt to impose martial law. Mr Yoon averted impeachment late Saturday.
summary: South Korea's leadership crisis deepened on Sunday as the country's main opposition party said that it would try again to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol after his short-lived attempt to impose martial law. Mr Yoon averted impeachment late Saturday.

title: How World Leaders Reacted To Downfall Of Bashar Al-Assad's Rule In Syria
content: Syria's army command notified officers on Sunday that President Bashar al-Assad's 24-year authoritarian rule has ended.
summary: Syria's army command notified officers on Sunday that President Bashar al-Assad's 24-year authoritarian rule has ended.

title: Bashar Al-Assad Out, Rebels Take Over: What Next For Syria And Its People
content: Syria's future hinges on uncertainty after the abrupt fall of President Bashar al-Assad's regime. Once thought unassailable, Assad's rule collapsed under the pressure of a rapid offensive led by a group called Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS).
summary: Syria's future hinges on uncertainty after the abrupt fall of President Bashar al-Assad's regime. Once thought unassailable, Assad's rule collapsed under the pressure of a rapid offensive led by a group called Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS).

title: "Failing To...": S Korea's Interior Minister Resigns Over Martial Law Fiasco
content: South Korea's interior minister resigned on Sunday following the declaration of martial law that plunged the country into turmoil.
summary: South Korea's interior minister resigned on Sunday following the declaration of martial law that plunged the country into turmoil.
